publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-2728 Mr Jack McConnell: Motion of Condolence-That the Parliament wishes to express its deep regret and sadness at the death of HRH The Princess Margaret and to convey its sincere condolences to Her Majesty The Queen, Her Majesty Queen Elizabeth The Queen Mother and other members of the Royal Family in their sad bereavement. Supported by: Mr John Swinney*, David McLetchie*, Mr Jim Wallace*
